pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:1.10_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:1.11_0: “How could Venerable Thullanandā block a legitimate distribution of robe-cloth?” ...
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:1.12_0: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:1.15_0: “... How could the nun Thullanandā do this?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:1.16_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:1.17_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:1.18.1_0: ‘If a nun blocks a legitimate distribution of robe-cloth, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:1.2_0: At that time out-of-season robe-cloth had been given to the Sangha of nuns,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:1.3_0: and the Sangha gathered to share it out.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:1.4_0: Just then the nuns who were pupils of the nun Thullanandā were away.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:1.6_0: “Venerables, there are nuns who are away. We cannot distribute the robe-cloth until they get back.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:1.7_0: And she blocked the distribution of robe-cloth.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:1.8_0: Since the robe-cloth could not be distributed until those nuns returned, other nuns left.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:1.9_0: Then, when her pupils returned, Thullanandā had that robe-cloth distributed.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:2.1.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:2.1.6_0: it is distributed by a unanimous Sangha of nuns.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:2.1.8_0: if she blocks it with the thought, “What can be done so that this robe-cloth isn’t distributed?”, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:2.2.1_0: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, and she perceives it as such, and she blocks it, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:2.2.2_0: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, but she is unsure of it, and she blocks it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:2.2.3_0: If it is illegitimate, and she perceives it as such, and she blocks it is legitimate, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:2.2.4_0: If it is illegitimate, but she perceives it as legitimate, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:2.2.5_0: If it is illegitimate legal procedure, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:2.2.6_0: If it is illegitimate, and she perceives it as such, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:2.3.2_0: if she obstructs them after demonstrating a benefit;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:2.3.4_0: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc27:2.3.5_0: The seventh rule, the training rule on married girls, is finished.
